definition: to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Critics of transgenic foods say this is ridiculous.
sentences.chinese: 转基因食品的批评者认为这很可笑。

sentences.english: Mr Romney's detractors offer several rebuttals.
sentences.chinese: 罗姆内的批评者提供了几项反驳意见。

sentences.english: Critics say “Confucius” belongs in the latter category.
sentences.chinese: 批评者们认为《孔子》就属于后一种。

sentences.english: The critics, it turns out, are other psychologists.
sentences.chinese: 而批评者是其他心理专家们。

sentences.english: Pride like that makes Mensa an easy 2)target for critics.
sentences.chinese: 这种骄气使得曼沙成为批评者容易攻击的靶子。

sentences.english: Critics said that Amanda is the sex symbol of the hard-bodied athletic world.
sentences.chinese: 批评者说，阿曼达是象征性的运动世界的硬体。

sentences.english: Others are frightened by the criticism but we have no problems with it.
sentences.chinese: 别人会被批评者吓住，但是我们毫无问题。

sentences.english: It is the first time Ms Merkel has confronted her critics head-on.
sentences.chinese: 这是默克尔首次正面迎击她的批评者。

sentences.english: Critics say Mr. Wu’s influence on government is waning.
sentences.chinese: 批评者说，吴敬琏对政府的影响力日益减弱。
不要攻击批评者，要从善如流。

sentences.english: To all the backward-looking critics, none of this matters.
sentences.chinese: 但所有批评者对这些都视而不见。

sentences.english: More broadly, critics question Mazar's motives.
sentences.chinese: 但批评者更多的是在质疑玛扎尔的动机。

sentences.english: Would Stoll consider responding directly to his critics on Yelp?
sentences.chinese: 将Stoll直接回应他的批评者认为对声吗？

sentences.english: One of her critics is Pai Ping-ping, a famedentertainer.
sentences.chinese: 其中一位批评者是女艺人白冰冰。

sentences.english: Even one of his harshest critics now praises him.
sentences.chinese: 甚至是他的最严厉的批评者之一现在都开始赞扬他了。

sentences.english: But critics say that the scheme amounts to privatisation of natural resources.
sentences.chinese: 但是批评者说这个计划会导致自然资源的私有化。
